body_html: Exactly. That is what numpy does and I keep forgetting it even though I wrote both the function and the docs. If einsum really is the only user, it might not be worth it, but I might just wrap einsum manually, but if there are more "flexible number of tensor args" or more than just varargs cases, they might benefit, too.

body: Exactly. That is what numpy does and I keep forgetting it even though I wrote both the function and the docs. If einsum really is the only user, it might not be worth it, but I might just wrap einsum manually, but if there are more "flexible number of tensor args" or more than just varargs cases, they might benefit, too.
